column5: I finally went and get my PAL and am now looking for a couple of guns. Do any of you avid hunters no of any Ontario internet sights that have a classified section for long guns.

Ill give ya two pieces of advice...  #1  Best place for used guns are gun shows... ive bought all my used pieces there.... usually good deals ... but for something new..... give Sam at Carra Outdoors a calll if your looking for something new... he set me up with a beauty this fall.  It was easy as pie...
http://www.canadiangunnutz.com  Lots of good info there, and a very good classifieds section as well.
Thanks for all the help guys. TJ can Sam ship if I decide to go new.

Hi Taper,  Couldn't help but see this thread and I can answer your question and it is Yes I ship clear across Canada.  If there is something that you would like let me know and I will see what I can do for you.  As far as used guns I am almost completely sold out of them all.  Thanks TJ for expressing your personal experience.  Best regards, Sam
